controller() - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion

L

LeapMotion - Class in com.leapmotion.leap.processing
Leap Motion library for Processing.
LeapMotion(PApplet) - Constructor for class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Create a new LeapMotion library with the specified applet.
leapToDisplayX(float) - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Return the specified x value in Leap Motion coordinates interpolated linearly to display coordindates.
leapToDisplayY(float) - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Return the specified y value in Leap Motion coordinates interpolated linearly to display coordindates.
leapToScreenX(float, float, float) - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Return the specified Leap Motion coordinates interpolated linearly to an x value in screen coordindates.
leapToScreenY(float, float, float) - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Return the specified Leap Motion coordinates interpolated linearly to a y value in screen coordindates.
leapToSketchX(float) - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Return the specified x value in Leap Motion coordinates interpolated linearly to sketch coordindates.
leapToSketchY(float) - Method in class com.leapmotion.leap.processing.LeapMotion
Return the specified y value in Leap Motion coordinates interpolated linearly to sketch coordindates.
